full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM RIM GYI NYAMS LEN DANG 'BREL BA'I MCHOD SBYIN BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR THE TSOM DANG BRAL BA'I MAN NGAG NGO MTSAR 'DI NI BLO SBYONG LAM RIM GCOD 'KHRID SOGS LEGS BSHAD RNAMS LAS PHYOGS GCIG TU DRIL NAS RANG GI NYAMS LEN DU DGE SLONG GRAGS PA MING CAN GYIS BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI DBU MDZAD NGAG DBANG LEGS BSHAD KYIS BGYIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
